markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Endure](/Spells.aspx?ID=2348)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 257

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Arazni](/Deities.aspx?ID=326), [Arqueros](/Deities.aspx?ID=645), [Embaral](/Deities.aspx?ID=340), [Fandarra](/Deities.aspx?ID=492), [Folgrit](/Deities.aspx?ID=448), [Grask Uldeth](/Deities.aspx?ID=555), [Haggakal](/Deities.aspx?ID=493), [Immaculate Growth](/Deities.aspx?ID=364), [Izuyaku](/Deities.aspx?ID=348), [Lorris](/Deities.aspx?ID=477), [Narakaas](/Deities.aspx?ID=672), [The Last Breath](/Deities.aspx?ID=270), [Thuskchoon](/Deities.aspx?ID=586), [Trudd](/Deities.aspx?ID=451), [Vonymos](/Deities.aspx?ID=553)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You invigorate the touched creature’s mind and urge it to press on. You grant the touched creature 5 [temporary Hit Points](/Rules.aspx?ID=2321) that last for 1 minute.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The temporary Hit Points increase by 5.
name: Endure
